name: Dcode.fr
description: A website that provides online tools for encoding, decoding, encryption and decryption.

name: CyberChef
description: A web-based app for decoding, encoding, compressing, and decompressing data.

name: MD5hashing.net
description: A website that provides an online tool for generating the MD5 hash of a string.

name: Rot13.com
description: A website that provides an online tool for encoding and decoding ROT13.

name: Feather Duster
description: A tool for performing automated cryptanalysis on ciphertext, including finding vulnerabilities such as weak keys and initialization vectors.

name: Hash Extender
description: A tool for performing hash length extension attacks.

name: Factordb.com
description: A website that provides a database of prime factorizations.

name: Padding Oracle Attacker
description: A tool for performing padding oracle attacks.

name: PK Crack
description: A tool for recovering private keys from weak RSA keys.

name: Quip Quip
description: A tool for steganography, encoding and decoding messages within images.

name: RSACTFTool
description: A tool for recovering RSA private keys with various attacks.

name: John the Ripper
description: A tool for password cracking that supports many different hash types.

name: Hashcat
description: A tool for password cracking that supports many different hash types and can run on CPU or GPU.

name: XORTool
description: A tool for XOR cipher analysis and decryption.

name: John The Jumbo
description: Community enhanced version of John the Ripper
